abstract: WNBA announces agreement with New York Liberty to indefinitely suspend Isiah Thomas's bid for partial ownership of team; follows three-week vetting process; Thomas will remain as team president.
lead_paragraph: The league and the team agreed to indefinitely suspend the application process three weeks after the W.N.B.A. formed a committee to vet Thomas’s ownership stake.

headline.main: W.N.B.A. Suspends Isiah Thomas’s Bid to Own Part of Liberty
headline.print_headline: League Suspends Thomas’s Bid to Own Part of Liberty

snippet: The league and the team agreed to indefinitely suspend the application process three weeks after the W.N.B.A. formed a committee to vet Thomas’s ownership stake.
